games.title: AstroForce
games.description: Astro Force is a nod to classic Shoot ’em ups from back in the day. Heavily inspired by Thunder force, RSG, Aleste, Gaiares, MSX Nemesis, and R-Type. Astro Force features 6 stages, 30+ enemy types, and 11 bosses.

games.title: BaraBuruu
games.description: Seemingly out of the blue, vile sea creatures start attacking peaceful coastal towns, as a strange tower-like structure rises from the icy depths of the ocean. Guide master ninjas Bara and Burū through thirty levels of the mysterious tower and vanquish the evil that dwells within!

games.title: BruceLee
games.description: You’re Bruce Lee, the undisputed master of martial arts. In a mysterious  and perilous fortress you seek to claim infinite wealth and the secret of immortality from the wizard who dwells within.

games.title: DARC
games.description: DARC is a jetpack shooter game inspired several games (Air fortress(NES), H.E.R.O. and Hero Core(PC)). The protagonist can fly and shoot in separate directions. Each of the gamepad keys represent a shooting direction. Your goal is to infiltrate the alien fortress. Destroy the cores to disable force fields and advance through the game.

games.title: Flight Of Pigarus
games.description: You are Pigarus, the flying pig. Score as many points as you can in the allotted time.

games.title: Galactic Revenge
games.description: It's the year 33XXX. Dirty aliens from a faraway galaxy emptied your refrigerator and killed your boyfriend. Confident in their superiority, they also had the nerve to steal your beloved Master System. Your are Olivia Gun. Get your blastin' shoes on and pick from three killer outfits. Wield fire, spread shots, lasers, and even shurikens.

games.title: Monkey Lad
games.description: A platform game for the Sega Master System. Run around and stomp on the monsters!

games.title: Silver Valley
games.description: Silver Valley is a mash of other games such as Castlevania or Wonderboy and features not just platforming but also flying, shooting and even sailing through 64 or more levels, all contained with a story driving the action.

games.title: Wing Warriors
games.description: Wing Warriors is a multi-platform game developed in 2015 for MSX and in 2019 for Master System, Game Gear, and Gameboy. It’s a classic shooting game with some bullet-hell reminiscences. 6 stages with 3 bosses, 3 different players to choose from, and a lot of bullets to avoid.
